document_data.name: ''Plinth Stone of the Moonmaiden''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Plinth Stone of the Moonmaiden''''' was one of the earliest altars used by the faithful of [[Sel√ªne]] on the slopes of [[Mount Waterdeep]].{{Cite web enhancement/Vanrakdoom|24}}
document_data.Description: The ''Plinth Stone'' was a massive block of tarnished [[silver]]. On its surface was carved a symbol of the Moonmaiden.
document_data.History: The ''Plinth Stone'' was stolen by the [[church of Shar]], and hidden in their base of [[Vanrakdoom]]. Defaced by carving a [[Holy symbol]] of [[Shar]] on top of that of the moon goddess, it served as a bier for [[Gorothir]]'s sarcophagus.
document_data.Notable Owners: * Lord [[Vanrak Moonstar]] the ''Dark Ranger'', [[death knight]] of Shar.
